Questions.QuestionText: What elements do you notice that are inappropriate for a piece of persuasive writing? To check your answer, type the elements into this text box.
Questions.AnswerText:
The following elements in this paragraph are informal:

  • I’m
  • all the time
  • all kinds
  • just to name a few
  • it’s high time
  • great things
  • totally
  • are you kidding me
  • serious coin
  • they’re
  • really
  • things like that
